title: Help with final documentation for admission
content: So i had went to the college to submit my documents for psychology but i didn't have my TC and study certificate cus they hadn't given it yet and later they asked proof to show that i studied at the same college for 11 and 12 and I had come from another city so didn't have anything else with me except what they had asked for. I have paid my fee and the lady said I can come between Monday to Friday but I'm a bit anxious cus i didn't get admitted that day and worried if I'll still get in when I go tomorrow. If anyone's had a similar experience or has any idea can u pls let me know???

comments.body: Just chill and get the temporary certificates that they have asked you like tc and stuff ask your previous school guys if they are ready to issue it, and if possible ask them if they can issue something temporarily i think it should be fine

Actually I also didn't submit my tc and study certificate, they just told me to submit it with the orginal 12th marks card. But I had a temporary study certificate so if you have one take it with you.
